member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_MOVE_RECT
member.summary: The DXGI_OUTDUPL_MOVE_RECT structure describes the movement of a rectangle.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_MOVE_RECT.SourcePoint
member.summary: The starting position of a rectangle.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_MOVE_RECT.DestinationRect
member.summary: The target region to which to move a rectangle.
